name: Respond to Webhook
natural_language_description: 这是 Respond to Webhook 节点。主要用于: Returns data for Webhook

enableResponseOutput.name: enableResponseOutput
enableResponseOutput.description: Whether to provide an additional output branch with the response sent to the webhook
enableResponseOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Enable Response Output Branch | 作用: Whether to provide an additional output branch with the response sent to the webhook | 默认值: False

generalNotice.displayName: Verify that the "Webhook" node's "Respond" parameter is set to "Using Respond to Webhook Node". <a href="https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.respondtowebhook/" target="_blank">More details
generalNotice.name: generalNotice
generalNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Verify that the "Webhook" node's "Respond" parameter is set to "Using Respond to Webhook Node". <a href="https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.respondtowebhook/" target="_blank">More details

respondWith.name: respondWith
respondWith.description: The data that should be returned
respondWith.natural_language_description: 参数名: Respond With | 作用: The data that should be returned | 默认值: firstIncomingItem
available_options: All Incoming Items (值: allIncomingItems) - Respond with all input JSON items
Binary File (值: binary) - Respond with incoming file binary data
First Incoming Item (值: firstIncomingItem) - Respond with the first input JSON item
JSON (值: json) - Respond with a custom JSON body
JWT Token (值: jwt) - Respond with a JWT token
No Data (值: noData) - Respond with an empty body
Redirect (值: redirect) - Respond with a redirect to a given URL
Text (值: text) - Respond with a simple text message body

webhookNotice.displayName: When using expressions, note that this node will only run for the first item in the input data
webhookNotice.name: webhookNotice
webhookNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: When using expressions, note that this node will only run for the first item in the input data

redirectURL.name: redirectURL
redirectURL.natural_language_description: 参数名: Redirect URL | 作用: The URL to redirect to | (必填项)

responseBody.name: responseBody
responseBody.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Body | 作用: The HTTP response text data

payload.name: payload
payload.description: The payload to include in the JWT token

responseDataSource.name: responseDataSource
responseDataSource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Data Source | 默认值: automatically
available_options: Choose Automatically From Input (值: automatically) - Use if input data will contain a single piece of binary data
Specify Myself (值: set) - Enter the name of the input field the binary data will be in

inputFieldName.name: inputFieldName
inputFieldName.description: The name of the node input field with the binary data
inputFieldName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Field Name | 作用: The name of the node input field with the binary data | 默认值: data | (必填项)

contentTypeNotice.displayName: To avoid unexpected behavior, add a "Content-Type" response header with the appropriate value
contentTypeNotice.name: contentTypeNotice
contentTypeNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: To avoid unexpected behavior, add a "Content-Type" response header with the appropriate value

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: responseCode (值: None) - The HTTP response code to return. Defaults to 200.
responseHeaders (值: None) - Add headers to the webhook response
responseKey (值: None) - The name of the response field to put all items in
enableStreaming (值: None) - Whether to enable streaming to the response
